title: Rule 19

fields.name: Abilifies:
fields.value:
-Attack a target.
-Gamethrow, causing a player with the same faction as yours to randomly die.
-Cheat, getting access to 2 player channels of 2 players with the same faction as yours.
-Get overly riled up over a discord game, causing 2 players of a faction  that cant win with yours to be banned.
-Become Post 1591 Asshole.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -At any point in time you may set your faction to be any faction in GIM. This doesnt affect anything except your abilities, you're still a NK with NK goal and all roles treat you as a NK.

desc:
Post 1982
*I will gamethrow, cheat, get overly riled up over a discord game, and be an asshole.*
